about.bio: Hi thereüëã, I'm David, welcome to my website. I'm a web developerü§ì, a fan of Manchester United‚ù§Ô∏è (even in this trying times ü§ß), and love video games.

responsibilities: Organized and improved the company's record keeping accuracy by up to 80%
Created a secure central online storage for the company's data for easy accessibility
Digitized records and provided capabilities of productivity daily, weekly, monthly, and annually
Assessing the company's system of operation to know how to incorporate software technologies for the company's daily activity and logistics
Built the company's website using Next.js, and Tailwind CSS-preprocessor
MongoDB was used for the database
session were made to be encrypted to improve security
I created it using the standard RESTful API endpoints
I also used express.js and EJS template engine
MongoDB was used for the database and Cloudinary for image hosting
Passport.js' Local and Google strategy was used for authentication
session were made to be encrypted to improve security
Collaborated in with the building of the company's customer care dashboard using vue.js and Bootstrap
Tested APIs using postman
Created UIs and PDF designs using Figma
Learned about the development process of making a professional web application

projects.name: TicTacToe
responsibilities: I used HTML, CSS, and Vanilla Js for developing the UI
I used Socket.io Client connection to establish a full-duple connection with the server once all the are ready
I used Express with EJS template engine on the server side
Used Socket.io event-listeners to listen for events from the client side

projects.name: My Portfolio Website
projects.description: My personal website to curate all my skills and experience
responsibilities: Used Tailwind CSS and Vanilla Js for developing the UI
Used EJS to create a template for the UI
Used Express on the server side
Implemented a content management UI
Added a layer of security to protect the content management aspect
Integrated Mailjet's API to send contact messages to my personal mail address

projects.name: The Fortnight Journal
responsibilities: Used React.js and Tailwind Css to develop the UI
Used Redux state management to handle the states and API calls
JSON web-tokens were used to maintain secure sessions
Cloudinary would be used to store the Images
